title: Frontend Engineering
description: A comprehensive skill path covering everything from web basics to modern frontend frameworks, performance optimization, and architecture best practices.

phases.title: Web Foundations (HTML, CSS, Accessibility)
phases.description: Learn the building blocks of the web including HTML, CSS, and making websites accessible.

phases.title: JavaScript for User Interfaces
phases.description: Learn JavaScript fundamentals to create dynamic and interactive web pages.

phases.title: Modern Frontend Frameworks
phases.description: Explore frameworks like React to build component-based UIs efficiently.

phases.title: Frontend Performance & Architecture
phases.description: Learn best practices for building fast, scalable, and maintainable frontend applications.
